body_content.explanation: the quality of not having or giving much light:
examples: The light bulb formed a bright spot in the dimness of the barn.
The dimness of the weak candle hid the little blemishes on her face.
He was barely visible in the dimness.

body_content.explanation: a lack of ability to see things well:
examples: The patient may complain of dimness of vision or impairment of hearing.

body_content.explanation: the fact of not being very clever:
examples: They show their dimness with every word they say.
It was an indication of her friend's dimness that he had not thought to lock the door behind him.
